name: archisteamfarm
title: ArchiSteamFarm
description: Interact with your locally hosted ASF instance via Raycast!

commands.name: copy-2fa
commands.title: Copy 2FA
commands.description: Copy a 2FA code from one of your ASF bots.

preferences.name: asfUrl
preferences.title: ASF URL
preferences.description: The URL of your ASF instance (e.g. http://localhost:1242)

preferences.name: ipcPassword
preferences.title: IPC Password
preferences.description: The IPC password defined in ASF, if any.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
